00020 #include <string.h>
00021 #include <stdlib.h>
00022 #include <ccn/ccn.h>
00023 #include <ccn/charbuf.h>
00024 #include <ccn/coding.h>
00025 #include <ccn/indexbuf.h>
00026 
00027 struct ccn_buf_decoder *
00028 ccn_buf_decoder_start(struct ccn_buf_decoder *d,
00029                       const unsigned char *buf, size_t size)
00030 {
00031     memset(&d->decoder, 0, sizeof(d->decoder));
00032     d->decoder.state |= CCN_DSTATE_PAUSE;
00033     d->buf = buf;
00034     d->size = size;
00035     ccn_skeleton_decode(&d->decoder, buf, size);
00036     return(d);
00037 }
00038 
00039 void
00040 ccn_buf_advance(struct ccn_buf_decoder *d)
00041 {
00042     ccn_skeleton_decode(&d->decoder,
00043                         d->buf + d->decoder.index,
00044                         d->size - d->decoder.index);
00045 }
00046 
00047 int
00048 ccn_buf_match_dtag(struct ccn_buf_decoder *d, enum ccn_dtag dtag)
00049 {
00050     return (d->decoder.state >= 0 &&
00051             CCN_GET_TT_FROM_DSTATE(d->decoder.state) == CCN_DTAG &&
00052             d->decoder.numval == dtag);
00053 }
00054 
00055 int
00056 ccn_buf_match_some_dtag(struct ccn_buf_decoder *d)
00057 {
00058     return(d->decoder.state >= 0 &&
00059            CCN_GET_TT_FROM_DSTATE(d->decoder.state) == CCN_DTAG);
00060 }
00061 
00062 int
00063 ccn_buf_match_some_blob(struct ccn_buf_decoder *d)
00064 {
00065     return(d->decoder.state >= 0 &&
00066            CCN_GET_TT_FROM_DSTATE(d->decoder.state) == CCN_BLOB);
00067 }
00068 
00069 int
00070 ccn_buf_match_blob(struct ccn_buf_decoder *d,
00071                    const unsigned char **bufp, size_t *sizep)
00072 {
00073     if (ccn_buf_match_some_blob(d)) {
00074         if (bufp != NULL)
00075             *bufp = d->buf + d->decoder.index;
00076         if (sizep != NULL)
00077             *sizep = d->decoder.numval;
00078         return (1);
00079     }
00080     if (bufp != NULL)
00081         *bufp = d->buf + d->decoder.token_index;
00082     if (sizep != NULL)
00083         *sizep = 0;
00084     return(0);
00085 }
00086 
00087 int
00088 ccn_buf_match_udata(struct ccn_buf_decoder *d, const char *s)
00089 {
00090     size_t len = strlen(s);
00091     return (d->decoder.state >= 0 &&
00092             CCN_GET_TT_FROM_DSTATE(d->decoder.state) == CCN_UDATA &&
00093             d->decoder.numval == len &&
00094             0 == memcmp(d->buf + d->decoder.index, s, len));
00095 }
00096 
00097 int
00098 ccn_buf_match_attr(struct ccn_buf_decoder *d, const char *s)
00099 {
00100     size_t len = strlen(s);
00101     return (d->decoder.state >= 0 &&
00102             CCN_GET_TT_FROM_DSTATE(d->decoder.state) == CCN_ATTR &&
00103             d->decoder.numval == len &&
00104             0 == memcmp(d->buf + d->decoder.index, s, len));
00105 }
00106 
00107 void
00108 ccn_buf_check_close(struct ccn_buf_decoder *d)
00109 {
00110     if (d->decoder.state >= 0) {
00111         if (CCN_GET_TT_FROM_DSTATE(d->decoder.state) != CCN_NO_TOKEN)
00112             d->decoder.state = CCN_DSTATE_ERR_NEST;
00113         else
00114             ccn_buf_advance(d);
00115     }
00116 }
00117 
00118 int
00119 ccn_buf_advance_past_element(struct ccn_buf_decoder *d)
00120 {
00121     enum ccn_tt tt;
00122     int nest;
00123     if (d->decoder.state < 0)
00124         return(d->decoder.state);
00125     tt = CCN_GET_TT_FROM_DSTATE(d->decoder.state);
00126     if (tt == CCN_DTAG || tt == CCN_TAG) {
00127         nest = d->decoder.nest;
00128         ccn_buf_advance(d);
00129         while (d->decoder.state >= 0 && d->decoder.nest >= nest)
00130             ccn_buf_advance(d);
00131         /* The nest decrements before the closer is consumed */
00132         ccn_buf_check_close(d);
00133     }
00134     else
00135         return(-1);
00136     if (d->decoder.state < 0)
00137         return(d->decoder.state);
00138     return (0);
00139 }
00140 
00141 int
00142 ccn_parse_required_tagged_BLOB(struct ccn_buf_decoder *d, enum ccn_dtag dtag,
00143                                int minlen, int maxlen)
00144 {
00145     int res = -1;
00146     size_t len = 0;
00147     if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, dtag)) {
00148         res = d->decoder.element_index;
00149         ccn_buf_advance(d);
00150         if (ccn_buf_match_some_blob(d)) {
00151             len = d->decoder.numval;
00152             ccn_buf_advance(d);
00153         }
00154         ccn_buf_check_close(d);
00155         if (len < minlen || (maxlen >= 0 && len > maxlen)) {
00156             d->decoder.state = -__LINE__;
00157         }
00158     }
00159     else
00160         d->decoder.state = -__LINE__;
00161     if (d->decoder.state < 0)
00162         return (d->decoder.state);
00163     return(res);
00164 }
00165 
00166 int
00167 ccn_parse_optional_tagged_BLOB(struct ccn_buf_decoder *d, enum ccn_dtag dtag,
00168                                int minlen, int maxlen)
00169 {
00170     if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, dtag))
00171         return(ccn_parse_required_tagged_BLOB(d, dtag, minlen, maxlen));
00172     return(-1);
00173 }
00174 
00175 uintmax_t
00176 ccn_parse_required_tagged_binary_number(struct ccn_buf_decoder *d,
00177                                         enum ccn_dtag dtag,
00178                                         int minlen, int maxlen)
00179 {
00180     uintmax_t value = 0;
00181     const unsigned char *p = NULL;
00182     size_t len = 0;
00183     int i;
00184     if (0 <= minlen && minlen <= maxlen && maxlen <= sizeof(value) &&
00185           ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, dtag)) {
00186         ccn_buf_advance(d);
00187         if (ccn_buf_match_blob(d, &p, &len))
00188             ccn_buf_advance(d);
00189         ccn_buf_check_close(d);
00190         if (d->decoder.state < 0)
00191             return(value);
00192         if (minlen <= len && len <= maxlen)
00193             for (i = 0; i < len; i++)
00194                 value = (value << 8) + p[i];
00195         else
00196             d->decoder.state = -__LINE__;
00197     }
00198     else
00199         d->decoder.state = -__LINE__;
00200     return(value);
00201 }
00202 
00203 uintmax_t
00204 ccn_parse_optional_tagged_binary_number(struct ccn_buf_decoder *d, enum ccn_dtag dtag,
00205 int minlen, int maxlen, uintmax_t default_value)
00206 {
00207     if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, dtag))
00208         return(ccn_parse_required_tagged_binary_number(d, dtag, minlen, maxlen));
00209     return(default_value);
00210 }
00211 
00212 int
00213 ccn_parse_required_tagged_UDATA(struct ccn_buf_decoder *d, enum ccn_dtag dtag)
00214 {
00215     int res = -1;
00216     if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, dtag)) {
00217         res = d->decoder.element_index;
00218         ccn_buf_advance(d);
00219         if (d->decoder.state >= 0 &&
00220             CCN_GET_TT_FROM_DSTATE(d->decoder.state) == CCN_UDATA)
00221             ccn_buf_advance(d);
00222         else
00223             d->decoder.state = -__LINE__;
00224         ccn_buf_check_close(d);
00225     }
00226     else
00227         d->decoder.state = -__LINE__;
00228     if (d->decoder.state < 0)
00229         return (-1);
00230     return(res);
00231 }
00232 
00233 int
00234 ccn_parse_optional_tagged_UDATA(struct ccn_buf_decoder *d, enum ccn_dtag dtag)
00235 {
00236     if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, dtag))
00237         return(ccn_parse_required_tagged_UDATA(d, dtag));
00238     return(-1);
00239 }
00240 
00241 /**
00242  * Parses a ccnb-encoded element expected to contain a UDATA string.
00243  * @param d is the decoder
00244  * @param dtag is the expected dtag value
00245  * @param store - on success, the string value is appended to store,
00246  *        with null termination.
00247  * @returns the offset into the store buffer of the copied value, or -1 for error.
00248  *        If a parse error occurs, d->decoder.state is set to a negative value.
00249  *        If the element is not present, -1 is returned but no parse error
00250  *        is indicated.
00251  */
00252 int
00253 ccn_parse_tagged_string(struct ccn_buf_decoder *d, enum ccn_dtag dtag, struct ccn_charbuf *store)
00254 {
00255     const unsigned char *p = NULL;
00256     size_t size = 0;
00257     int res;
00258     
00259     if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, dtag)) {
00260         ccn_buf_advance(d);
00261         if (d->decoder.state >= 0 &&
00262             CCN_GET_TT_FROM_DSTATE(d->decoder.state) == CCN_UDATA) {
00263             p = d->buf + d->decoder.index;
00264             size = d->decoder.numval;
00265             ccn_buf_advance(d);
00266         }
00267         ccn_buf_check_close(d);
00268         if (d->decoder.state >= 0) {
00269             // XXX - should check for valid utf-8 data.
00270             res = store->length;
00271             if (size > 0)
00272                 ccn_charbuf_append(store, p, size);
00273             ccn_charbuf_append_value(store, 0, 1);
00274             return(res);
00275         }
00276     }
00277     return(-1);
00278 }
00279 
00280 /**
00281  * Parses a ccnb-encoded name
00282  * @param d is the decoder
00283  * @param components may be NULL, otherwise is filled in with the 
00284  *        Component boundary offsets
00285  * @returns the number of Components in the Name, or -1 if there is an error.
00286  */
00287 int
00288 ccn_parse_Name(struct ccn_buf_decoder *d, struct ccn_indexbuf *components)
00289 {
00290     int ncomp = 0;
00291     if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_Name)) {
00292         if (components != NULL) components->n = 0;
00293         ccn_buf_advance(d);
00294         while (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_Component)) {
00295             if (components != NULL)
00296                 ccn_indexbuf_append_element(components, d->decoder.token_index);
00297             ncomp += 1;
00298             ccn_buf_advance(d);
00299             if (ccn_buf_match_blob(d, NULL, NULL))
00300                 ccn_buf_advance(d);
00301             ccn_buf_check_close(d);
00302         }
00303         if (components != NULL)
00304             ccn_indexbuf_append_element(components, d->decoder.token_index);
00305         ccn_buf_check_close(d);
00306     }
00307     else
00308         d->decoder.state = -__LINE__;
00309     if (d->decoder.state < 0)
00310         return(-1);
00311     else
00312         return(ncomp);
00313 }
00314 
00315 int
00316 ccn_parse_PublisherID(struct ccn_buf_decoder *d, struct ccn_parsed_interest *pi)
00317 {
00318     int res = -1;
00319     int iskey = 0;
00320     unsigned pubstart = d->decoder.token_index;
00321     unsigned keystart = pubstart;
00322     unsigned keyend = pubstart;
00323     unsigned pubend = pubstart;
00324     iskey = ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_PublisherPublicKeyDigest);
00325     if (iskey                                                          ||
00326         ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_PublisherCertificateDigest)     ||
00327         ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_PublisherIssuerKeyDigest)       ||
00328         ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_PublisherIssuerCertificateDigest)) {
00329         res = d->decoder.element_index;
00330         ccn_buf_advance(d);
00331         keystart = d->decoder.token_index;
00332         if (!ccn_buf_match_some_blob(d))
00333             return (d->decoder.state = -__LINE__);
00334         ccn_buf_advance(d);
00335         keyend = d->decoder.token_index;
00336         ccn_buf_check_close(d);
00337         pubend = d->decoder.token_index;
00338     }
00339     if (d->decoder.state < 0)
00340         return (d->decoder.state);
00341     if (pi != NULL) {
00342         pi->offset[CCN_PI_B_PublisherID] = pubstart;
00343         pi->offset[CCN_PI_B_PublisherIDKeyDigest] = keystart;
00344         pi->offset[CCN_PI_E_PublisherIDKeyDigest] = iskey ? keyend : keystart;
00345         pi->offset[CCN_PI_E_PublisherID] = pubend;
00346     }
00347     return(res);
00348 }
00349 
00350 static int
00351 ccn_parse_optional_Any_or_Bloom(struct ccn_buf_decoder *d)
00352 {
00353     int res;
00354     res = ccn_parse_optional_tagged_BLOB(d, CCN_DTAG_Bloom, 1, 1024+8);
00355     if (res >= 0)
00356         return(res);
00357     if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_Any)) {
00358         ccn_buf_advance(d);
00359         ccn_buf_check_close(d);
00360         res = 0;
00361     }
00362     if (d->decoder.state < 0)
00363         return (d->decoder.state);
00364     return(res);
00365 }
00366 
00367 int
00368 ccn_parse_Exclude(struct ccn_buf_decoder *d)
00369 {
00370     int res = -1;
00371     if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_Exclude)) {
00372         res = d->decoder.element_index;
00373         ccn_buf_advance(d);
00374         ccn_parse_optional_Any_or_Bloom(d);
00375         while (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_Component)) {
00376             ccn_parse_required_tagged_BLOB(d, CCN_DTAG_Component, 0, -1);
00377             ccn_parse_optional_Any_or_Bloom(d);
00378         }
00379         ccn_buf_check_close(d);
00380     }
00381     if (d->decoder.state < 0)
00382         return (d->decoder.state);
00383     return(res);
00384 }

00386 
00387 
00388 int
00389 ccn_parse_nonNegativeInteger(struct ccn_buf_decoder *d)
00390 {
00391     const unsigned char *p;
00392     int i;
00393     int n;
00394     unsigned val;
00395     unsigned newval;
00396     unsigned char c;
00397     if (d->decoder.state < 0)
00398         return(-1);
00399     if (CCN_GET_TT_FROM_DSTATE(d->decoder.state) == CCN_UDATA) {
00400         p = d->buf + d->decoder.index;
00401         n = d->decoder.numval;
00402         if (n < 1) { d->decoder.state = -__LINE__; return(-1); }
00403         val = 0;
00404         for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00405             c = p[i];
00406             if ('0' <= c && c <= '9') {
00407                 newval = val * 10 + (c - '0');
00408                 if (newval < val) {
00409                     d->decoder.state = -__LINE__;
00410                     return(-1);
00411                 }
00412                 val = newval;
00413             }
00414             else {
00415                 d->decoder.state = -__LINE__;
00416                 return(-1);
00417             }
00418         }
00419         ccn_buf_advance(d);
00420         return(val);
00421     }
00422     d->decoder.state = -__LINE__;
00423     return(-1);
00424 }
00425 
00426 /**
00427  * Parse a potentially large non-negative integer.
00428  *
00429  * @returns 0 for success, and the value is place in *result; for an error
00430  * a negative value is returned and *result is unchanged.
00431  */
00432 int
00433 ccn_parse_uintmax(struct ccn_buf_decoder *d, uintmax_t *result)
00434 {
00435     const unsigned char *p;
00436     int i;
00437     int n;
00438     uintmax_t val;
00439     uintmax_t newval;
00440     unsigned char c;
00441     if (d->decoder.state < 0)
00442         return(d->decoder.state);
00443     if (CCN_GET_TT_FROM_DSTATE(d->decoder.state) == CCN_UDATA) {
00444         p = d->buf + d->decoder.index;
00445         n = d->decoder.numval;
00446         if (n < 1)
00447             return(d->decoder.state = -__LINE__);
00448         val = 0;
00449         for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00450             c = p[i];
00451             if ('0' <= c && c <= '9') {
00452                 newval = val * 10 + (c - '0');
00453                 if (newval < val)
00454                     return(d->decoder.state = -__LINE__);
00455                 val = newval;
00456             }
00457             else
00458                 return(d->decoder.state = -__LINE__);
00459         }
00460         ccn_buf_advance(d);
00461         *result = val;
00462         return(0);
00463     }
00464     return(d->decoder.state = -__LINE__);
00465 }
00466 
00467 int
00468 ccn_parse_timestamp(struct ccn_buf_decoder *d)
00469 {
00470     const unsigned char dlm[] = "--T::.Z";
00471     const unsigned char *p;
00472     int i;
00473     int k;
00474     int n;
00475     if (d->decoder.state < 0)
00476         return(d->decoder.state);
00477     if (CCN_GET_TT_FROM_DSTATE(d->decoder.state) == CCN_BLOB) {
00478         /* New-style binary timestamp, 12-bit fraction */
00479         n = d->decoder.numval;
00480         if (n < 3 || n > 7)
00481             return(d->decoder.state = -__LINE__);
00482         ccn_buf_advance(d);
00483         return(0);
00484     }
00485     if (CCN_GET_TT_FROM_DSTATE(d->decoder.state) == CCN_UDATA) {
00486         /* This is for some temporary back-compatibility */
00487         p = d->buf + d->decoder.index;
00488         n = d->decoder.numval;
00489         if (n < 8 || n > 40)
00490             return(d->decoder.state = -__LINE__);
00491         if (p[n - 1] != 'Z')
00492             return(d->decoder.state = -__LINE__);
00493         for (i = 0, k = 0; i < n && '0' <= p[i] && p[i] <= '9';) {
00494             i++;
00495             if (i < n && p[i] == dlm[k]) {
00496                 if (dlm[k++] == 0)
00497                     return(d->decoder.state = -__LINE__);
00498                 i++;
00499             }
00500         }
00501         if (k < 5)
00502             return(d->decoder.state = -__LINE__);
00503         if (!(i == n || i == n - 1))
00504             return(d->decoder.state = -__LINE__);
00505         ccn_buf_advance(d);
00506         return(0);
00507     }
00508     return(d->decoder.state = -__LINE__);
00509 }
00510 
00511 int
00512 ccn_parse_required_tagged_timestamp(struct ccn_buf_decoder *d, enum ccn_dtag dtag)
00513 {
00514     int res = -1;
00515     if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, dtag)) {
00516         res = d->decoder.element_index;
00517         ccn_buf_advance(d);
00518         ccn_parse_timestamp(d);
00519         ccn_buf_check_close(d);
00520     }
00521     else
00522         d->decoder.state = -__LINE__;
00523     if (d->decoder.state < 0)
00524         return (-1);
00525     return(res);
00526 }
00527 
00528 int
00529 ccn_parse_optional_tagged_nonNegativeInteger(struct ccn_buf_decoder *d, enum ccn_dtag dtag)
00530 {
00531     int res = -1;
00532     if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, dtag)) {
00533         ccn_buf_advance(d);
00534         res = ccn_parse_nonNegativeInteger(d);
00535         ccn_buf_check_close(d);
00536     }
00537     if (d->decoder.state < 0)
00538         return (-1);
00539     return(res);
00540 }
00541 
00542 int
00543 ccn_fetch_tagged_nonNegativeInteger(enum ccn_dtag tt,
00544                                     const unsigned char *buf,
00545                                     size_t start, size_t stop)
00546 {
00547     struct ccn_buf_decoder decoder;
00548     struct ccn_buf_decoder *d;
00549     int result = -1;
00550     if (stop < start) return(-1);
00551     d = ccn_buf_decoder_start(&decoder, buf + start, stop - start);
00552     if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, tt)) {
00553         ccn_buf_advance(d);
00554         result = ccn_parse_nonNegativeInteger(d);
00555         ccn_buf_check_close(d);
00556     }
00557     if (result < 0)
00558         return(-1);
00559     return(result);
00560 }
00561 
00562 
00563 int
00564 ccn_parse_interest(const unsigned char *msg, size_t size,
00565                    struct ccn_parsed_interest *interest,
00566                    struct ccn_indexbuf *components)
00567 {
00568     struct ccn_buf_decoder decoder;
00569     struct ccn_buf_decoder *d = ccn_buf_decoder_start(&decoder, msg, size);
00570     int magic = 0;
00571     int ncomp = 0;
00572     int res;
00573     if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_Interest)) {
00574         if (components == NULL) {
00575             /* We need to have the component offsets. */
00576             components = ccn_indexbuf_create();
00577             if (components == NULL) return(-1);
00578             res = ccn_parse_interest(msg, size, interest, components);
00579             ccn_indexbuf_destroy(&components);
00580             return(res);
00581         }
00582         ccn_buf_advance(d);
00583         interest->offset[CCN_PI_B_Name] = d->decoder.element_index;
00584         interest->offset[CCN_PI_B_Component0] = d->decoder.index;
00585         ncomp = ccn_parse_Name(d, components);
00586         if (d->decoder.state < 0) {
00587             memset(interest->offset, 0, sizeof(interest->offset));
00588             return(d->decoder.state);
00589         }
00590         interest->offset[CCN_PI_E_ComponentLast] = d->decoder.token_index - 1;
00591         interest->offset[CCN_PI_E_Name] = d->decoder.token_index;
00592         interest->prefix_comps = ncomp;
00593         interest->offset[CCN_PI_B_LastPrefixComponent] = components->buf[(ncomp > 0) ? (ncomp - 1) : 0];
00594         interest->offset[CCN_PI_E_LastPrefixComponent] = components->buf[ncomp];
00595         /* optional MinSuffixComponents, MaxSuffixComponents */
00596         interest->min_suffix_comps = 0;
00597         interest->max_suffix_comps = 32767;
00598         interest->offset[CCN_PI_B_MinSuffixComponents] = d->decoder.token_index;
00599         res = ccn_parse_optional_tagged_nonNegativeInteger(d,
00600                                                            CCN_DTAG_MinSuffixComponents);
00601         interest->offset[CCN_PI_E_MinSuffixComponents] = d->decoder.token_index;
00602         if (res >= 0)
00603             interest->min_suffix_comps = res;
00604         interest->offset[CCN_PI_B_MaxSuffixComponents] = d->decoder.token_index;
00605         res = ccn_parse_optional_tagged_nonNegativeInteger(d,
00606                                                            CCN_DTAG_MaxSuffixComponents);
00607         interest->offset[CCN_PI_E_MaxSuffixComponents] = d->decoder.token_index;
00608         if (res >= 0)
00609             interest->max_suffix_comps = res;
00610         if (interest->max_suffix_comps < interest->min_suffix_comps)
00611             return (d->decoder.state = -__LINE__);
00612         /* optional PublisherID */
00613         res = ccn_parse_PublisherID(d, interest);
00614         /* optional Exclude element */
00615         interest->offset[CCN_PI_B_Exclude] = d->decoder.token_index;
00616         res = ccn_parse_Exclude(d);
00617         interest->offset[CCN_PI_E_Exclude] = d->decoder.token_index;
00618         /* optional ChildSelector */
00619         interest->offset[CCN_PI_B_ChildSelector] = d->decoder.token_index;
00620         res = ccn_parse_optional_tagged_nonNegativeInteger(d,
00621                          CCN_DTAG_ChildSelector);
00622         if (res < 0)
00623             res = 0;
00624         interest->orderpref = res;
00625         interest->offset[CCN_PI_E_ChildSelector] = d->decoder.token_index;
00626         if (interest->orderpref > 5)
00627             return (d->decoder.state = -__LINE__);        
00628         /* optional AnswerOriginKind */
00629         interest->offset[CCN_PI_B_AnswerOriginKind] = d->decoder.token_index;
00630         interest->answerfrom = ccn_parse_optional_tagged_nonNegativeInteger(d,
00631                          CCN_DTAG_AnswerOriginKind);
00632         interest->offset[CCN_PI_E_AnswerOriginKind] = d->decoder.token_index;
00633         if (interest->answerfrom == -1)
00634             interest->answerfrom = CCN_AOK_DEFAULT;
00635         else if ((interest->answerfrom & CCN_AOK_NEW) != 0 &&
00636                  (interest->answerfrom & CCN_AOK_CS) == 0)
00637             return (d->decoder.state = -__LINE__);
00638         /* optional Scope */
00639         interest->offset[CCN_PI_B_Scope] = d->decoder.token_index;
00640         interest->scope = ccn_parse_optional_tagged_nonNegativeInteger(d,
00641                          CCN_DTAG_Scope);
00642         interest->offset[CCN_PI_E_Scope] = d->decoder.token_index;
00643         if (interest->scope > 9)
00644                 return (d->decoder.state = -__LINE__);
00645         if ((interest->answerfrom & CCN_AOK_EXPIRE) != 0 &&
00646             interest->scope != 0)
00647                 return (d->decoder.state = -__LINE__);
00648         /* optional InterestLifetime */
00649         interest->offset[CCN_PI_B_InterestLifetime] = d->decoder.token_index;
00650         res = ccn_parse_optional_tagged_BLOB(d, CCN_DTAG_InterestLifetime, 1, 8);
00651         if (res >= 0)
00652             magic |= 20100401;
00653         interest->offset[CCN_PI_E_InterestLifetime] = d->decoder.token_index;
00654         /* optional Nonce */
00655         interest->offset[CCN_PI_B_Nonce] = d->decoder.token_index;
00656         res = ccn_parse_optional_tagged_BLOB(d, CCN_DTAG_Nonce, 4, 64);
00657         interest->offset[CCN_PI_E_Nonce] = d->decoder.token_index;
00658         interest->offset[CCN_PI_B_OTHER] = d->decoder.token_index;
00659         /* this is for local use */
00660         ccn_parse_optional_tagged_nonNegativeInteger(d, CCN_DTAG_FaceID);
00661         interest->offset[CCN_PI_E_OTHER] = d->decoder.token_index;
00662         ccn_buf_check_close(d);
00663         interest->offset[CCN_PI_E] = d->decoder.index;
00664     }
00665     else
00666         return (d->decoder.state = -__LINE__);
00667     if (d->decoder.state < 0)
00668         return (d->decoder.state);
00669     if (d->decoder.index != size || !CCN_FINAL_DSTATE(d->decoder.state))
00670         return (CCN_DSTATE_ERR_CODING);
00671     if (magic == 0)
00672         magic = 20090701;
00673     if (!(magic == 20090701 || magic == 20100401))
00674         return (d->decoder.state = -__LINE__);
00675     interest->magic = magic;
00676     return (ncomp);
00677 }
00678 
00679 struct parsed_KeyName {
00680     int Name;
00681     int endName;
00682     int PublisherID;
00683     int endPublisherID;
00684 };
00685 
00686 static int
00687 ccn_parse_KeyName(struct ccn_buf_decoder *d, struct parsed_KeyName *x)
00688 {
00689     int res = -1;
00690     if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_KeyName)) {
00691         res = d->decoder.element_index;
00692         ccn_buf_advance(d);
00693         x->Name = d->decoder.token_index;
00694         ccn_parse_Name(d, NULL);
00695         x->endName = d->decoder.token_index;
00696         x->PublisherID = ccn_parse_PublisherID(d, NULL);
00697         x->endPublisherID = d->decoder.token_index;
00698         ccn_buf_check_close(d);
00699     }
00700     else
00701         d->decoder.state = -__LINE__;
00702     if (d->decoder.state < 0)
00703         return (d->decoder.state);
00704     return(res);
00705 }
00706 
00707 static int
00708 ccn_parse_Signature(struct ccn_buf_decoder *d, struct ccn_parsed_ContentObject *x)
00709 {
00710     int res = -1;
00711     int i;
00712     struct ccn_parsed_ContentObject dummy;
00713     if (x == NULL)
00714         x = &dummy;
00715     for (i = CCN_PCO_B_Signature; i <= CCN_PCO_E_Signature; i++) {
00716         x->offset[i] = d->decoder.token_index;
00717     }
00718     if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_Signature)) {
00719         res = d->decoder.element_index;
00720         ccn_buf_advance(d);
00721         x->offset[CCN_PCO_B_DigestAlgorithm] = d->decoder.token_index;
00722         ccn_parse_optional_tagged_UDATA(d, CCN_DTAG_DigestAlgorithm);
00723         x->offset[CCN_PCO_E_DigestAlgorithm] = d->decoder.token_index;
00724         x->offset[CCN_PCO_B_Witness] = d->decoder.token_index;
00725         ccn_parse_optional_tagged_BLOB(d, CCN_DTAG_Witness, 8, -1);
00726         x->offset[CCN_PCO_E_Witness] = d->decoder.token_index;
00727         x->offset[CCN_PCO_B_SignatureBits] = d->decoder.token_index;
00728         ccn_parse_required_tagged_BLOB(d, CCN_DTAG_SignatureBits, 16, -1);
00729         x->offset[CCN_PCO_E_SignatureBits] = d->decoder.token_index;
00730         ccn_buf_check_close(d);
00731         x->offset[CCN_PCO_E_Signature] = d->decoder.token_index;
00732     }
00733     if (d->decoder.state < 0)
00734         return (d->decoder.state);
00735     return(res);
00736 }
00737 
00738 static int
00739 ccn_parse_SignedInfo(struct ccn_buf_decoder *d, struct ccn_parsed_ContentObject *x)
00740 {
00741     x->offset[CCN_PCO_B_SignedInfo] = d->decoder.token_index;
00742     if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_SignedInfo)) {
00743         ccn_buf_advance(d);
00744         x->offset[CCN_PCO_B_PublisherPublicKeyDigest] = d->decoder.token_index;
00745         ccn_parse_required_tagged_BLOB(d, CCN_DTAG_PublisherPublicKeyDigest, 16, 64);
00746         x->offset[CCN_PCO_E_PublisherPublicKeyDigest] = d->decoder.token_index;
00747         
00748         x->offset[CCN_PCO_B_Timestamp] = d->decoder.token_index;
00749         ccn_parse_required_tagged_timestamp(d, CCN_DTAG_Timestamp);
00750         x->offset[CCN_PCO_E_Timestamp] = d->decoder.token_index;
00751         
00752         x->offset[CCN_PCO_B_Type] = d->decoder.token_index;
00753         x->type = CCN_CONTENT_DATA;
00754         x->type = ccn_parse_optional_tagged_binary_number(d, CCN_DTAG_Type, 3, 3, CCN_CONTENT_DATA);
00755         x->offset[CCN_PCO_E_Type] = d->decoder.token_index;
00756         
00757         x->offset[CCN_PCO_B_FreshnessSeconds] = d->decoder.token_index;
00758         ccn_parse_optional_tagged_nonNegativeInteger(d, CCN_DTAG_FreshnessSeconds);
00759         x->offset[CCN_PCO_E_FreshnessSeconds] = d->decoder.token_index;
00760         
00761         x->offset[CCN_PCO_B_FinalBlockID] = d->decoder.token_index;
00762         ccn_parse_optional_tagged_BLOB(d, CCN_DTAG_FinalBlockID, 1, -1);
00763         x->offset[CCN_PCO_E_FinalBlockID] = d->decoder.token_index;
00764         
00765         x->offset[CCN_PCO_B_KeyLocator] = d->decoder.token_index;
00766         x->offset[CCN_PCO_B_Key_Certificate_KeyName] = d->decoder.token_index;
00767         x->offset[CCN_PCO_E_Key_Certificate_KeyName] = d->decoder.token_index;
00768         x->offset[CCN_PCO_B_KeyName_Name] = d->decoder.token_index;
00769         x->offset[CCN_PCO_E_KeyName_Name] = d->decoder.token_index;
00770         x->offset[CCN_PCO_B_KeyName_Pub] = d->decoder.token_index;
00771         x->offset[CCN_PCO_E_KeyName_Pub] = d->decoder.token_index;
00772         if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_KeyLocator)) {
00773             ccn_buf_advance(d);
00774             x->offset[CCN_PCO_B_Key_Certificate_KeyName] = d->decoder.token_index;
00775             if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_Key)) {
00776                 (void)ccn_parse_required_tagged_BLOB(d, CCN_DTAG_Key, 0, -1);
00777             }
00778             else if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_Certificate)) {
00779                 (void)ccn_parse_required_tagged_BLOB(d, CCN_DTAG_Certificate, 0, -1);
00780             }
00781             else {
00782                 struct parsed_KeyName keyname = {-1, -1, -1, -1};
00783                 if (ccn_parse_KeyName(d, &keyname) >= 0) {
00784                     if (keyname.Name >= 0) {
00785                         x->offset[CCN_PCO_B_KeyName_Name] = keyname.Name;
00786                         x->offset[CCN_PCO_E_KeyName_Name] = keyname.endName;
00787                     }
00788                     if (keyname.PublisherID >= 0) {
00789                         x->offset[CCN_PCO_B_KeyName_Pub] = keyname.PublisherID;
00790                         x->offset[CCN_PCO_E_KeyName_Pub] = keyname.endPublisherID;
00791                     }
00792                 }
00793             }
00794             x->offset[CCN_PCO_E_Key_Certificate_KeyName] = d->decoder.token_index;
00795             ccn_buf_check_close(d);
00796         }
00797         x->offset[CCN_PCO_E_KeyLocator] = d->decoder.token_index;
00798         
00799         x->offset[CCN_PCO_B_ExtOpt] = d->decoder.token_index;
00800         ccn_parse_optional_tagged_BLOB(d, CCN_DTAG_ExtOpt, 2, -1);
00801         x->offset[CCN_PCO_E_ExtOpt] = d->decoder.token_index;
00802         
00803         ccn_buf_check_close(d);
00804     }
00805     else
00806         d->decoder.state = -__LINE__;
00807     x->offset[CCN_PCO_E_SignedInfo] = d->decoder.token_index;
00808     if (d->decoder.state < 0)
00809         return (d->decoder.state);
00810     return(0);
00811 }
00812 
00813 int
00814 ccn_parse_ContentObject(const unsigned char *msg, size_t size,
00815                         struct ccn_parsed_ContentObject *x,
00816                         struct ccn_indexbuf *components)
00817 {
00818     struct ccn_buf_decoder decoder;
00819     struct ccn_buf_decoder *d = ccn_buf_decoder_start(&decoder, msg, size);
00820     int res;
00821     x->magic = 20090415;
00822     x->digest_bytes = 0;
00823     if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_ContentObject)) {
00824         ccn_buf_advance(d);
00825         res = ccn_parse_Signature(d, x);
00826         x->offset[CCN_PCO_B_Name] = d->decoder.token_index;
00827         x->offset[CCN_PCO_B_Component0] = d->decoder.index;
00828         res = ccn_parse_Name(d, components);
00829         if (res < 0)
00830             d->decoder.state = -__LINE__;
00831         x->name_ncomps = res;
00832         x->offset[CCN_PCO_E_ComponentLast] = d->decoder.token_index - 1;
00833         x->offset[CCN_PCO_E_Name] = d->decoder.token_index;
00834         ccn_parse_SignedInfo(d, x);
00835         x->offset[CCN_PCO_B_Content] = d->decoder.token_index;
00836         ccn_parse_required_tagged_BLOB(d, CCN_DTAG_Content, 0, -1);
00837         x->offset[CCN_PCO_E_Content] = d->decoder.token_index;
00838         ccn_buf_check_close(d);
00839         x->offset[CCN_PCO_E] = d->decoder.index;
00840     }
00841     else
00842         d->decoder.state = -__LINE__;
00843     if (d->decoder.index != size || !CCN_FINAL_DSTATE(d->decoder.state))
00844         return (CCN_DSTATE_ERR_CODING);
00845     return(0);
00846 }
00847 
00848 int
00849 ccn_ref_tagged_BLOB(enum ccn_dtag tt,
00850                     const unsigned char *buf, size_t start, size_t stop,
00851                     const unsigned char **presult, size_t *psize)
00852 {
00853     struct ccn_buf_decoder decoder;
00854     struct ccn_buf_decoder *d;
00855     if (stop < start) return(-1);
00856     d = ccn_buf_decoder_start(&decoder, buf + start, stop - start);
00857     if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, tt)) {
00858         ccn_buf_advance(d);
00859         if (ccn_buf_match_blob(d, presult, psize))
00860             ccn_buf_advance(d);
00861         ccn_buf_check_close(d);
00862     }
00863     else
00864         return(-1);
00865     if (d->decoder.index != d->size || !CCN_FINAL_DSTATE(d->decoder.state))
00866         return (CCN_DSTATE_ERR_CODING);
00867     return(0);
00868 }
00869 /**
00870  * Produce a pointer and length for the string in a ccnb-encoded tagged element
00871  * containing a UDATA string.
00872  * @param dtag is the expected dtag value
00873  * @param buf is a ccnb-encoded source.
00874  * @param start is an offset into buf at which the element starts
00875  * @param stop is an offset into buf where the element ends
00876  * @param presult if non-NULL, a pointer through which pointer into buf
00877  *        for start of string will be stored
00878  * @param psize if non-NULL, a pointer through which size of string will be stored.
00879  * @returns 0 on success, <0 on failure.
00880  */
00881 
00882 int
00883 ccn_ref_tagged_string(enum ccn_dtag dtag,
00884                     const unsigned char *buf, size_t start, size_t stop,
00885                     const unsigned char **presult, size_t *psize)
00886 {
00887     struct ccn_buf_decoder decoder;
00888     struct ccn_buf_decoder *d;
00889     const unsigned char *result = NULL;
00890     size_t size = 0;
00891 
00892     if (stop < start) return(-1);
00893     d = ccn_buf_decoder_start(&decoder, buf + start, stop - start);
00894     if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, dtag)) {
00895         ccn_buf_advance(d);
00896         if (d->decoder.state >= 0 &&
00897             CCN_GET_TT_FROM_DSTATE(d->decoder.state) == CCN_UDATA) {
00898             result = d->buf + d->decoder.index;
00899             size = d->decoder.numval;
00900             ccn_buf_advance(d);
00901         }
00902         ccn_buf_check_close(d);
00903     }
00904     else
00905         return(-1);
00906     if (d->decoder.index != d->size || !CCN_FINAL_DSTATE(d->decoder.state))
00907         return (CCN_DSTATE_ERR_CODING);
00908     if (presult) *presult = result;
00909     if (psize) *psize = size;
00910     return(0);
00911 }
00912 
00913 static struct ccn_buf_decoder *
00914 ccn_buf_decoder_start_at_components(struct ccn_buf_decoder *d,
00915     const unsigned char *buf, size_t buflen)
00916 {
00917     ccn_buf_decoder_start(d, buf, buflen);
00918     while (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_Name) ||
00919            ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_Interest) ||
00920            ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_ContentObject)
00921            ) {
00922         ccn_buf_advance(d);
00923         ccn_parse_Signature(d, NULL);
00924     }
00925     return(d);
00926 }
00927 
00928 int
00929 ccn_content_get_value(const unsigned char *data, size_t data_size,
00930                       const struct ccn_parsed_ContentObject *content,
00931                       const unsigned char **value, size_t *value_size)
00932 {
00933     int res;
00934     res = ccn_ref_tagged_BLOB(CCN_DTAG_Content, data,
00935           content->offset[CCN_PCO_B_Content],
00936           content->offset[CCN_PCO_E_Content],
00937           value, value_size);
00938     return(res);
00939 }
00940 
00941 int
00942 ccn_compare_names(const unsigned char *a, size_t asize,
00943                   const unsigned char *b, size_t bsize)
00944 {
00945     struct ccn_buf_decoder a_decoder;
00946     struct ccn_buf_decoder b_decoder;
00947     struct ccn_buf_decoder *aa =
00948         ccn_buf_decoder_start_at_components(&a_decoder, a, asize);
00949     struct ccn_buf_decoder *bb =
00950         ccn_buf_decoder_start_at_components(&b_decoder, b, bsize);
00951     const unsigned char *acp = NULL;
00952     const unsigned char *bcp = NULL;
00953     size_t acsize;
00954     size_t bcsize;
00955     int cmp = 0;
00956     int more_a;
00957     for (;;) {
00958         more_a = ccn_buf_match_dtag(aa, CCN_DTAG_Component);
00959         cmp = more_a - ccn_buf_match_dtag(bb, CCN_DTAG_Component);
00960         if (more_a == 0 || cmp != 0)
00961             break;
00962         ccn_buf_advance(aa);
00963         ccn_buf_advance(bb);
00964         acsize = bcsize = 0;
00965         if (ccn_buf_match_blob(aa, &acp, &acsize))
00966             ccn_buf_advance(aa);
00967         if (ccn_buf_match_blob(bb, &bcp, &bcsize))
00968             ccn_buf_advance(bb);
00969         cmp = acsize - bcsize;
00970         if (cmp != 0)
00971             break;
00972         cmp = memcmp(acp, bcp, acsize);
00973         if (cmp != 0)
00974             break;
00975         ccn_buf_check_close(aa);
00976         ccn_buf_check_close(bb);
00977     }
00978     return (cmp);
00979 }
00980 
00981 int
00982 ccn_parse_LinkAuthenticator(struct ccn_buf_decoder *d, struct ccn_parsed_Link *pl)
00983 {    
00984     /* Implement with a single offset for the blob, CCN_PL_[BE]_PublisherDigest
00985      * and remember the DTAG value to indicate which type of digest it is
00986      */
00987     if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_LinkAuthenticator)) {
00988         ccn_buf_advance(d);                         // advance over DTAG token
00989         pl->offset[CCN_PL_B_LinkAuthenticator] = d->decoder.token_index;
00990         pl->offset[CCN_PL_B_PublisherID] = d->decoder.token_index;
00991         pl->offset[CCN_PL_B_PublisherDigest] = d->decoder.token_index;
00992         pl->offset[CCN_PL_E_PublisherDigest] = d->decoder.token_index;
00993         
00994         if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_PublisherPublicKeyDigest)      ||
00995             ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_PublisherCertificateDigest)    ||
00996             ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_PublisherIssuerKeyDigest)      ||
00997             ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_PublisherIssuerCertificateDigest)) {
00998             pl->publisher_digest_type = d->decoder.numval;  // remember the DTAG 
00999             ccn_buf_advance(d);                         // over the DTAG token
01000             if (!ccn_buf_match_some_blob(d))
01001                 return (d->decoder.state = -__LINE__);
01002             pl->offset[CCN_PL_B_PublisherDigest] = d->decoder.token_index;
01003             ccn_buf_advance(d);                         // over the digest
01004             pl->offset[CCN_PL_E_PublisherDigest] = d->decoder.token_index;
01005             ccn_buf_check_close(d);                     // over the DTAG closer
01006         }
01007         if (d->decoder.state < 0)
01008             return (d->decoder.state);
01009         pl->offset[CCN_PL_E_PublisherID] = d->decoder.token_index;
01010         
01011         /* parse optional NameComponentCount nonNegativeInteger */
01012         pl->offset[CCN_PL_B_NameComponentCount] = d->decoder.token_index;
01013         pl->name_component_count = ccn_parse_optional_tagged_nonNegativeInteger(d, CCN_DTAG_NameComponentCount);
01014         pl->offset[CCN_PL_E_NameComponentCount] = d->decoder.token_index;
01015         
01016         /* parse optional Timestamp TimestampType */
01017         pl->offset[CCN_PL_B_Timestamp] = d->decoder.token_index;
01018         if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_Timestamp))
01019             ccn_parse_required_tagged_timestamp(d, CCN_DTAG_Timestamp);
01020         pl->offset[CCN_PL_E_Timestamp] = d->decoder.token_index;
01021         
01022         /* parse optional Type ContentType */
01023         pl->offset[CCN_PL_B_Type] = d->decoder.token_index;
01024         pl->type = ccn_parse_optional_tagged_binary_number(d, CCN_DTAG_Type, 3, 3, CCN_CONTENT_DATA);
01025         pl->offset[CCN_PL_E_Type] = d->decoder.token_index;
01026         
01027         /* parse optional ContentDigest Base64BinaryType */
01028         pl->offset[CCN_PL_B_ContentDigest] = d->decoder.token_index;
01029         ccn_parse_optional_tagged_BLOB(d, CCN_DTAG_ContentDigest, 32, 32);
01030         pl->offset[CCN_PL_E_ContentDigest] = d->decoder.token_index;
01031         ccn_buf_check_close(d);
01032         pl->offset[CCN_PL_E_LinkAuthenticator] = d->decoder.token_index;
01033         } else
01034         d->decoder.state = -__LINE__;
01035     if (!CCN_FINAL_DSTATE(d->decoder.state))
01036         return (CCN_DSTATE_ERR_CODING);
01037     return(0);
01038 }
01039 
01040 int
01041 ccn_parse_Link(struct ccn_buf_decoder *d,
01042                struct ccn_parsed_Link *link,
01043                struct ccn_indexbuf *components)
01044 {
01045     int ncomp = 0;
01046     int res;
01047     if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_Link)) {
01048         if (components == NULL) {
01049             /* We need to have the component offsets. */
01050             components = ccn_indexbuf_create();
01051             if (components == NULL) return(-1);
01052             res = ccn_parse_Link(d, link, components);
01053             ccn_indexbuf_destroy(&components);
01054             return(res);
01055         }
01056         ccn_buf_advance(d);
01057         link->offset[CCN_PL_B_Name] = d->decoder.element_index;
01058         link->offset[CCN_PL_B_Component0] = d->decoder.index;
01059         ncomp = ccn_parse_Name(d, components);
01060         if (d->decoder.state < 0) {
01061             memset(link->offset, 0, sizeof(link->offset));
01062             return(d->decoder.state);
01063         }
01064         link->offset[CCN_PL_E_ComponentLast] = d->decoder.token_index - 1;
01065         link->offset[CCN_PL_E_Name] = d->decoder.token_index;
01066         link->name_ncomps = ncomp;
01067         /* parse optional Label string */
01068         link->offset[CCN_PL_B_Label] = d->decoder.token_index;
01069         res = ccn_parse_optional_tagged_UDATA(d, CCN_DTAG_Label);
01070         link->offset[CCN_PL_E_Label] = d->decoder.token_index;
01071         /* parse optional LinkAuthenticator LinkAuthenticatorType */
01072         if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_LinkAuthenticator))
01073             res = ccn_parse_LinkAuthenticator(d, link);
01074         ccn_buf_check_close(d);
01075     }
01076     else
01077         return (d->decoder.state = -__LINE__);
01078     if (d->decoder.state < 0)
01079         return (d->decoder.state);
01080     return(ncomp);
01081 }
01082 
01083 int
01084 ccn_parse_Collection_start(struct ccn_buf_decoder *d)
01085 {
01086     if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_Collection)) {
01087         ccn_buf_advance(d);
01088     }
01089     else
01090         return (d->decoder.state = -__LINE__);
01091     if (d->decoder.state < 0)
01092         return (d->decoder.state);
01093     return(0);    
01094 
01095 }
01096 
01097 int
01098 ccn_parse_Collection_next(struct ccn_buf_decoder *d,
01099                           struct ccn_parsed_Link *link,
01100                           struct ccn_indexbuf *components)
01101 {
01102     if (ccn_buf_match_dtag(d, CCN_DTAG_Link)) {
01103         return(ccn_parse_Link(d, link, components));
01104     } else
01105         ccn_buf_check_close(d);
01106     
01107     if (d->decoder.state < 0)
01108         return(d->decoder.state);
01109     else
01110         return(0);
01111 }
